Question: In 2007, this person was inducted into the Long Island Music Hall of Fame.
Hints: In January 1987, this person sang the national anthem at the Super Bowl.
Smash Mouth covered this person's "I'm a Believer" for their 2001 self-titled album.
This person later followed with "Cherry, Cherry", "Kentucky Woman", "Thank the Lord for the Night Time", "Do It", and others.
